Events.OnCreate:
(block (gateList)
(switch ; Find a stargate more than 400 light-seconds away (not (setq gateList (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "GR:400; -uncharted;"))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID (random gateList)))
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 250) ) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) )
; Add some enemy ships patrolling around the stargate (for i 1 (random 4 6) (block (enemyObj) (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scSandstorm; gateObj &svAres;)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'patrol gateObj 20) ) )
(msnAddTimerEvent gSource (+ travelTime (random 0 200)) 'OnFreighterArrives) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (not (msnGetData gSource 'state)) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'dock)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Escort a supply ship from " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 0) "back to " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) 4) ".

"
"System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: " (fmtCurrency 'credit (msnGetData gSource 'reward)) )

(cat "The XO walks up to you.\n\n"
"\"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you.\"" )

(cat "\"A supply ship is arriving at the " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) ". Your orders are to escort it back to " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) 4) " and defend it against all enemies. Carry On!\"" )
"\"Get the hell out of here then!\""
"\"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!\""
"\"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!\""
"\"Outstanding mission! Those supplies are desperately needed here.\""
